@remotesynth @techevangelista @NetlifyCMS Yes I’m a big fan of @eleven_ty. Mostly because I like how it generates no more & no less than what I ask it too. It’s very like @jekyllrb in that regard. But the fact that it only depends on js at build time makes it very easy to comprehend and bootstrap. I use it for all sorts.
